SnapEnhance - An Xposed module offering an enhanced Snapchat experience

About | Log | Files | Refs | License

pull_request.yml (4674B) - raw

      1 name: Pull Request CI
      2 on:
      3   pull_request:
      4     branches: ["dev"]
      5 
      6 jobs:
      7   job_armv8:
      8     runs-on: macos-latest
      9     steps:
     10       - name: Checkout repo
     11         uses: actions/checkout@v4
     12         with:
     13           submodules: 'recursive'
     14 
     15       - name: Set up JDK 21
     16         uses: actions/setup-java@v4
     17         with:
     18           java-version: '21'
     19           distribution: 'temurin'
     20           cache: gradle
     21 
     22       - name: Grant execute permission for gradlew
     23         run: chmod +x gradlew
     24 
     25       - name: Setup NPM Dependencies
     26         run: npm install typescript -g
     27 
     28       - name: Build
     29         run: ./gradlew assembleArmv8Debug
     30 
     31       - name: Get current build version
     32         id: version-env
     33         run: |
     34           ./gradlew getVersion
     35           echo "version=$(cat app/build/version.txt)" >> $GITHUB_ENV
     36 
     37       - name: Rename APK file
     38         run: |
     39           mv app/build/outputs/apk/armv8/debug/*.apk app/build/outputs/apk/armv8/debug/snapenhance-${{ env.version }}-armv8-${GITHUB_SHA::7}.apk
     40 
     41       - name: Upload artifact
     42         uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
     43         with:
     44           name: snapenhance-armv8-debug
     45           path: app/build/outputs/apk/armv8/debug/*.apk
     46           
     47   job_armv7:
     48     runs-on: macos-latest
     49     steps:
     50       - name: Checkout repo
     51         uses: actions/checkout@v4
     52         with:
     53           submodules: 'recursive'
     54 
     55       - name: Set up JDK 21
     56         uses: actions/setup-java@v4
     57         with:
     58           java-version: '21'
     59           distribution: 'temurin'
     60           cache: gradle
     61 
     62       - name: Grant execute permission for gradlew
     63         run: chmod +x gradlew
     64 
     65       - name: Setup NPM Dependencies
     66         run: npm install typescript -g
     67 
     68       - name: Build
     69         run: ./gradlew assembleArmv7Debug
     70 
     71       - name: Get current build version
     72         id: version-env
     73         run: |
     74           ./gradlew getVersion
     75           echo "version=$(cat app/build/version.txt)" >> $GITHUB_ENV
     76 
     77       - name: Rename APK file
     78         run: |
     79           mv app/build/outputs/apk/armv7/debug/*.apk app/build/outputs/apk/armv7/debug/snapenhance-${{ env.version }}-armv7-${GITHUB_SHA::7}.apk
     80 
     81       - name: Upload artifact
     82         uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
     83         with:
     84           name: snapenhance-armv7-debug
     85           path: app/build/outputs/apk/armv7/debug/*.apk
     86 
     87   job_universal:
     88     runs-on: macos-latest
     89     steps:
     90       - name: Checkout repo
     91         uses: actions/checkout@v4
     92         with:
     93           submodules: 'recursive'
     94 
     95       - name: Set up JDK 21
     96         uses: actions/setup-java@v4
     97         with:
     98           java-version: '21'
     99           distribution: 'temurin'
    100           cache: gradle
    101 
    102       - name: Grant execute permission for gradlew
    103         run: chmod +x gradlew
    104 
    105       - name: Setup NPM Dependencies
    106         run: npm install typescript -g
    107         
    108       - name: Build
    109         run: ./gradlew assembleAllDebug
    110 
    111       - name: Get current build version
    112         id: version-env
    113         run: |
    114           ./gradlew getVersion
    115           echo "version=$(cat app/build/version.txt)" >> $GITHUB_ENV
    116 
    117       - name: Rename APK file
    118         run: |
    119           mv app/build/outputs/apk/all/debug/*.apk app/build/outputs/apk/all/debug/snapenhance-${{ env.version }}-universal-${GITHUB_SHA::7}.apk
    120 
    121       - name: Upload universal

    123         with:
    124           name: snapenhance-universal-debug
    125           path: app/build/outputs/apk/all/debug/*.apk
    126 
    127   job_manager:
    128     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    129     steps:
    130       - name: Checkout repo
    131         uses: actions/checkout@v4
    132         with:
    133           submodules: 'recursive'
    134 
    135       - name: Set up JDK 21
    136         uses: actions/setup-java@v4
    137         with:
    138           java-version: '21'
    139           distribution: 'temurin'
    140           cache: gradle
    141 
    142       - name: Grant execute permission for gradlew
    143         run: chmod +x gradlew
    144 
    145       - name: Build
    146         run: ./gradlew manager:assembleDebug
    147

    149         uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4

    151           name: manager

    153 
    154   job_core:
    155     runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    158         uses: actions/checkout@v4
    159         with:
    160           submodules: 'recursive'
    161 
    162       - name: Set up JDK 21
    163         uses: actions/setup-java@v4
    164         with:
    165           java-version: '21'
    166           distribution: 'temurin'
    167           cache: gradle
    168 
    169       - name: Grant execute permission for gradlew

    172       - name: Build
